data.comment: The match is underway in Incheon.
Throw-in for Seongnam in the half of Incheon Utd.
In the minute 2, In Incheon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Seongnam.
Throw-in for Seongnam at Incheon Football Stadium.
In the minute 6, Free kick Seongnam.
Yong-woo Kim awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Seongnam close to the penalty box.
In the minute 8, Incheon Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Incheon Utd to take a throw-in in Seongnam territory.
Goal kick for Seongnam at Incheon Football Stadium.
In the minute 10, Can Incheon Utd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seongnam's half?
Free kick for Incheon Utd in the half of Seongnam.
Incheon Utd drive upfield and Kim Do-hyeok gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Seongnam defender.
In the minute 12, Seongnam have a goal kick.
Yong-woo Kim signals a Incheon Utd throw-in in Seongnam's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 14, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Seongnam.
Throw-in for Seongnam in their own half.
In the minute 17, Elias Aguilar for Incheon Utd gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Seongnam goal kick.
In Incheon, Park Tae-jun of Seongnam is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 18, Seongnam have been awarded a corner by Yong-woo Kim.
Free kick for Incheon Utd in their own half.
Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Incheon Utd in their own half.
Kim Jeong-ho for Incheon Utd is back on the field again.
In the minute 24, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Kim Jeong-ho for Incheon Utd who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Kim Jeong-ho (Incheon Utd) has received a yellow card from Yong-woo Kim.
In the minute 25, In Incheon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Incheon Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Incheon Utd.
In the minute 26, Yu In-soo for Seongnam has been booked by Yong-woo Kim and receives a first yellow card.
Incheon Utd's Stefan Mugosa gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Seongnam defender.
Corner awarded to Incheon Utd.
In the minute 30, Free kick for Seongnam in the half of Incheon Utd.
Incheon Utd to take a throw-in in Seongnam territory.
Ball safe as Seongnam is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 33, Incheon Utd have a dangerous throw-in.
Incheon Utd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Incheon Utd in the half of Seongnam.
In the minute 34, Free kick for Seongnam in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Incheon.
Free kick Incheon Utd.
In the minute 37, Ball safe as Seongnam is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Incheon Utd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seongnam's half?
Seongnam awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 38, Throw-in Seongnam.
Seongnam make their first substitution with Yang Dong-hyeon replacing Kim Hyeon-seong.
Incheon Utd have been awarded a corner by Yong-woo Kim.
In the minute 40, Kim Dong-min (Incheon Utd) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Yong-woo Kim awards Seongnam a goal kick.
Throw-in for Incheon Utd in their own half.
In the minute 42, Yong-woo Kim signals a Seongnam throw-in in Incheon Utd's half.
Yong-woo Kim awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Incheon Utd.
In the minute 44, Free kick for Incheon Utd in the half of Seongnam.
Incheon Utd's Lee Jun-seok misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Seongnam goal kick.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Seongnam at Incheon Football Stadium.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Seongnam in their own half.
In the minute 45, Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Seongnam in their own half.
Yong-woo Kim blows to end the first-half.
The second half has started at Incheon Football Stadium.
In the minute 46, Seongnam awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Seongnam in their own half.
Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Incheon Utd.
In the minute 54, In Incheon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Incheon Utd's Stefan Mugosa is on target but unsuccessful.
Seongnam to take a throw-in in Incheon Utd territory.
In the minute 56, Can Incheon Utd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seongnam's half?
Free kick for Seongnam in their own half.
Incheon Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Seongnam.
In the minute 57, Incheon Utd's Kim Dong-min has been booked in Incheon.
Na Sangho is on target to give Seongnam a 0-1 advantage.
In the minute 60, Incheon Utd are coming forward and Stefan Mugosa gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Yong-woo Kim awards Seongnam a goal kick.
Ball safe as Incheon Utd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Seongnam in their own half.
Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Incheon Utd in their own half.
Yong-woo Kim awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 64, Goal kick for Seongnam at Incheon Football Stadium.
Incheon Utd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Incheon Utd pushes forward through Park Dae-han, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 67, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The away team replace Jamshid Iskanderov with Yun Yong-Ho.
Song Shi-uh is on a sub for Ji Eon-hak for Incheon Utd.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Incheon Utd in the half of Seongnam.
Incheon Utd have been awarded a corner by Yong-woo Kim.
Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Incheon Utd.
In the minute 75, It's a goal kick for the home team in Incheon.
Seongnam have a goal kick.
Sung-Hwan Cho (Incheon Utd) is making a second substitution, with Jung Chang-yong replacing Lee Jun-seok.
In the minute 78, Seongnam awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Incheon Utd in Incheon.
Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Seongnam in their own half.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Incheon Utd at Incheon Football Stadium.
Throw-in Seongnam.
Free kick for Seongnam in their own half.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Incheon Utd in their own half.
Free kick Incheon Utd.
Seongnam awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 85, Yong-woo Kim signals a Incheon Utd throw-in in Seongnam's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Seongnam goal kick.
Park Su-il is replacing Park Tae-jun for Seongnam at Incheon Football Stadium.
In the minute 88, Seongnam take a comfortable 0-2 lead thanks to Na Sangho.
Can Incheon Utd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seongnam's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Seongnam in the half of Incheon Utd.
Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Incheon Utd in their own half.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Incheon.
Free kick for Incheon Utd in the half of Seongnam.
Incheon Utd are pushing forward but Elias Aguilar's finish is wide of the goal.
Yong-woo Kim awards Seongnam a goal kick.
Free kick for Seongnam in their own half.
Ball safe as Incheon Utd is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jung Chang-yong (Incheon Utd) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Incheon Utd.
Corner awarded to Incheon Utd.
Stefan Mugosa's header is off-target for Incheon Utd.
Seongnam have a goal kick.
In Incheon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Incheon.
Free kick for Incheon Utd in their own half.
Yong-woo Kim blows to end the match. The final score is 0-2.
Im Eun-su is replacing Rashid Mahazi for the home team.
